text: Rosmah Mansor was the wife of former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak. She gained significant attention for her lavish lifestyle and expensive fashion choices. Rosmah, like her husband, was involved in the 1Malaysia Development Berhad scandal. On 1 September 2022, she was declared guilty of corruption related to a school electricity project. She was fined $303 million and sentenced to ten years in prison. On December 19, 2024, a Malaysian high court acquitted Rosmah Mansor of seventeen counts of money laundering and tax evasion due to insufficient evidence. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian people Category:Criminals
title: Rosmah Mansor
